body.name: Aureday Phone Tripod, Flexible Tripod for iPhone and Android Cell Phone, Portable Small Tripod with Wireless Remote and Clip for Video Recording/Vlogging/Selfie Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 43 mins
features: Versatile Tripod Stand-Every travel photographer needs reliable equipment. Aureday mini tripod works as a handle grip monopod stick or a bendable versatile tripod that you can set on the tabletop or use on the move when taking selfies, group photos, and vlogging.

Lightweight and Compact-Weighs only 87g, features a compact construction with a height of 9.4 inches, it fits easily into your pocket or handbag, offering immense portability and convenience for easy packing and traveling, like hiking and climbing.

Durable and Stable-Made of premium metal, reinforced with high-quality foam, combined with the non-slip rubber feet, the tripod legs are comfortable to hold by hand, easily stand on an uneven surface, or tightly wrap around stable objects like trees.

Flexible and Rotatable-The legs are bendable to set on various occasions. The 360°rotatable ball head allows for complete and precise control over the angle and direction of the device, enabling you to take an outstanding landscape or portrait image.

Extendable and Compatible-It comes with an adjustable spring-loaded phone clip that can accommodate iPhone series and android phones ranging from 2.3-5.5inches. The hands-free wireless remote works from a distance up to 33ft/10m, easy for you to take sharp photography.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wrap it Bendable and adjustable to support your devices in the accurate position.
Grab it Portable and lightweight to help you take unusual photographys and videos.
Stand it Durable and stable to achieve a steady shot with most lightweight cameras.

Llightweight travel tripod With the incredible self-weight of 87g, it’s definitely a good choice of portable travel tripod for photographers or videographers on the go. Not just a tripod stand The mini tripod is flexible to wrap into a tabletop stand for smartphones and tablets, you are able to set your device to it with full security. Fun to use The legs are super flexible, it is also secure and stable when wrapped around objects like railings or trees and won’t slip off or slide down. 360° rotatable ball head The ball head allows for precise control over the angle and direction of the device, enabling you to take an outstanding landscape or portrait image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile and Reliable Companion for Capturing Precious Moments!
reviews.reviewText: The Aureday Flexible Phone Tripod has quickly become an essential tool in my photography and videography endeavors. With its versatility, reliability, and exceptional value for money, it has exceeded my expectations and become a reliable companion for capturing precious moments.Let's start with the flexibility of this tripod. Its bendable legs allow for endless positioning possibilities, enabling me to secure my iPhone in various angles and positions. Whether I'm wrapping it around a tree branch, attaching it to a railing, or simply using it as a traditional tripod on a flat surface, it adapts effortlessly to any situation. This flexibility has opened up new creative possibilities, allowing me to capture unique perspectives and stunning shots.The build quality of the Aureday tripod is outstanding. The legs are sturdy and well-made, providing a stable base for my phone. The adjustable phone holder securely grips my iPhone, ensuring it stays in place even during more active shooting situations. I appreciate the thoughtful design that accommodates different phone sizes and case thicknesses, offering versatility for various devices.Portability is another standout feature of this tripod. It's lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry around in my bag or even pocket. The ability to fold the legs and collapse the tripod to a smaller size adds to its convenience. Whether I'm traveling, hiking, or simply out and about, I can always have it ready to capture those spontaneous moments.The Aureday tripod is not only suitable for photography but also for videography. It offers stability and smooth panning for capturing high-quality videos. The ability to position the tripod at different heights and angles allows for versatile recording options, whether I'm shooting vlogs, tutorials, or simply documenting my adventures.Additionally, the tripod's compatibility with my iPhone is flawless. The phone holder securely fits my device, and the connection is stable throughout my shooting sessions. I've never experienced any wobbling or shaking, ensuring steady and crisp images and videos.The Aureday Flexible Phone Tripod is a versatile and reliable accessory for iPhone photography and videography. With its flexibility, sturdy build quality, portability, and excellent compatibility, it offers an exceptional value for its price. This tripod has become an indispensable tool in my creative endeavors, allowing me to capture precious moments with ease. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and versatile tripod for their iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, cool color, easy to transport, works great, soft covered bendable legs, sturdy, and fits my phone. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds your phone very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I love this tripod. I gave it a 4 star because it is not able to extend. It works great wrapping around items and holding still. I only have an issue when there is not anything tall around. The remote works great! If you are looking for a small tripod to travel with then this one is great! I got it for our honeymoon and we used it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When your arm simply isn’t long enough
reviews.reviewText: This is a well made, intuitive tripod for my iPhone. The legs are bendable giving it a capability to sit on most any surface firmly. It also comes with a remote control which allows you to set up the picture, return to your place in the photo and remotely snap it.A real price performer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini phone tripod
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Good size and comfortable grips make it easy to hold and film or take pics with your phone. Flexible yet sturdy tripod legs make it easy to hang or attach to items for stationary filming. The remote is an added bonus. Also has a camera attachment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL LITTLE ADDITION TO OUR FILMING SCHEDULE
reviews.reviewText: So economical and works perfectly in all kinds of situations. Of course you don't have the versatility of a full sized tripod, but it gets the job done close up and in small spaces. Also works as a selfie stick. We are using this quite a bit already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can’t orient phone in a portrait orientation
reviews.reviewText: The tripod is simple and decently constructed, but you cannot position the phone vertically. Had to buy something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome! Sturdy and has two different mounting points, but it!
